Classes

A heating device that extracts energy from outdoor air to heat the building.

Building

A collection of information about a specifi building.

DataPoint

A single data point on a Graph. Holds a reference to the GraphArea it is part of to access positional and range information.

A heating method that acts as the baseline heating method in this project.

A single Cell of a Grid.

DrawGrid

A 2D array of Cells with a defined width and depth.

A heating device that extracts energy from ground to heat the building.
